title: <generic greeting here> from Victoria University of Wellington!
body:
Victoria University will be participating in the OCC, showing all those upstart Aucklanders and Australians that the real skill is down south (not too far south, though. We don't need to burn couches to keep warm). 

VUW Esports events are currently organised through the Victoria Engineering Club (name aside, we do everything, not just engineering stuff). We organise stuff through our facebook [here](https://www.facebook.com/VictoriaEngineeringClub). If you're in a team, or want to join a team, hit us up - we host team creation events, online competitions and LAN events for LoL players on an approximately consistent basis.

replies.body:
Ah, my old Uni

Best of luck fellas
